title: Provides that a child shall not be taken into protective custody based on parent's Munchausen syndrome by proxy without a family court hearing thereon
summary: Provides that a child shall not be taken into protective custody based on an allegation that a custodial parent or guardian suffers from Munchausen syndrome by proxy without a family court hearing on such allegations.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to taking a child into protective custody on the basis of an allegation of a parent or guardian with Munchausen syndrome by proxy
